Name: The Last Dance Saloon
About the game: Bounty hunters are after you. Again. The Last Dance Saloon is a gun-toting, time-looping, rhythm-based shootout at the edge of the known universe. Every time you wake up at the bar, they're waiting outside to blast you to bits. Every time you die, they all come back. Every new loop is a chance to do it right. You're up against an army out there, but that's only made you stronger. One day, you'll bring them all down. Features Dual-Wielded Revolvers: Enemies are vulnerable to green or blue lasers. You've got both. Quantum Meddling: The exact types of enemies you'll encounter are different every loop. Drinks on the House: Consume alcohol to gain temporary abilities. That's how it works. Leaderboards: Test yourself against your friends and the top players of the world.
